verses.roman:
"rātrye parvata pāra kariba nija-loka diyā
bhojana karaha tumi randhana kariyā"

synonyms: rātrye—at night; parvata—the hilly tract; pāra kariba—I shall cross; nija-loka diyā—with my own men; bhojana karaha—just take your meal; tumi—you; randhana kariyā—cooking.
translation: The landlord said,"I shall get you across that hilly tract at night with my own men. Now just take your lunch and cook for yourself."
